sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useContext } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Loading from './Loading' import Repos from './Repos' import GithubContext from '../context/github/githubContext' const UserDetails = () => { const { getUser,loading,user, repos, getUserRepos } = useContext(GithubContext) const {login} = useParams(); useEffect(()=> { getUser(String(login)); getUserRepos(String(login)); }, []) const {name,avatar_url,location,html_url,bio,blog,followers,following,public_repos} = user; if(loading) return return (

{ name }

{location}

Github Profile

{ bio && <>

About

{bio}

} { blog && <>

Blog

{blog}

}
Followers: {followers} Following: {following} Repos: {public_repos}
) } export default UserDetails
